alert.note: Alert for Athens; Meigs (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 12 at 8:00PM EDT until August 12 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Meigs County in southeastern Ohio... Southeastern Athens County in southeastern Ohio... West central Wood County in northwestern West Virginia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 800 PM EDT, a tornado producing storm was located near Coolville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic storm will be near... Coolville, Washington, and Tuppers Plains around 805 PM EDT. Lubeck around 810 PM EDT. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
